extendedInfo.description: Free Calling and Texting to any phone in US and Canada. Make your Android device a true free Internet phone. No strings attached! Unlimited FREE calling, texting and picture sharing to Facebook and Google friends, or any phone number in US and Canada (requires free Google Voiceâ  account). Login with Facebook or Google account to make free calls and chat with friends anywhere in the world, even when you are on a plane. Configure your Google Voiceâ  to have absolutely FREE calls and SMS to regular phone numbers in North America. Share pictures with friends who also use Talkatone app. You don't have to earn calling credits with Talkatone app to make free calls to anyone in US and Canada - you just make free calls without worrying about your minutes. And yes, there is no limits on free calls to US and Canada.*** TOP FEATURES *** â¢ Free calling and texting over WiFi or 3G/4G* â¢ Free incoming calls and texts** â¢ Calls and texts with Facebook friends without phone numbers worldwide â¢ Universal Address Bookâ¢ Voicemail access (requires Android 3.0/Honeycomb or newer)â¢ High quality audio with voice compression for calls.â¢ Highest-rated free phone calling app â¢ Unbeatable FREE support within 24 hours. (*Internet provider data charges may apply) (** free Google Voice number to receive incoming calls is available for US users only)*** IMPORTANT *** â¢ To minimize data and battery usage during the calls and while app is idle, you'll be connected to Google through Talkatone's servers. Contact Talkatone Support for more details. â¢ Free phone calls to regular phones in US and Canada requires an existing Google Voiceâ  account. â¢ Free SMS texting is available for US users only. *** FINE PRINT *** To cover the cost of development and providing the service Talkatone app displays banner ads.For calls initiated through main dialer and completed by Talkatone app, a pre-roll ad may be shown once in a while.Upon first login to your Google account you will receive welcome email with activation/setup instruction for calling and/or texting and initial calling activation needs to be completed on your computer.Facebookâ  graph and chat are provided by Facebook Platform. Talkatone, Inc is NOT affiliated with Facebook. Google Talkâ  and Google Voiceâ  services are provided by Google, Inc. Talkatone, Inc is NOT affiliated with Google, Inc. Google Voiceâ  is a call enhancement service which may not route emergency (911) calls. Please lookup non-911 number for emergency services in your area and add it to your contacts to initiate calls in case of emergency.Google Voiceâ  free calling is available for US and Canada users only.For International calls (outside of US and Canada), please review Google Voiceâ  calling rates.Free SMS texting with Google Voiceâ  is available for US users only.Google Voiceâ  does not support international SMS.*** WEB PRESENCE *** http://www.talkatone.com/ http://facebook.com/talkatone http://twitter.com/talkatone

reviews.title: Add New Contacts
reviews.comment: I downloaded the latest updated recently and now I can\'t figure out how to add new contacts to the address book. I never had this problem before I updated the app, am I missing or not seeing something that I should be? I would greatly appreciate any instructions or feedback regarding this issue I\'m having. Thanks and have a great day!
reviews.author: Amy Jones

reviews.title: Gr8 App BUT!
reviews.comment: I love this app, I bought the ad free & premium for 1 month 2 test it out, been using this 4 a year now BUT I would like to be able to DELETE one message at a time.  I don\'t want to clear ALL messages. Just some messages. Need some privacy.  Otherwise gr8 job. No Call waiting either. Push notifications would be great too
reviews.author: Jerald Brooks

reviews.title: A must have
reviews.comment: Works very well over Wi-Fi and 4G. Voice quality is on par or slightly clearer than a call over the cellular network. Seamless integration with Google Voice and Facebook. I\'m highly satisfied with this app.
reviews.author: Renard Monczunski

reviews.title: bluetooth volume problem
reviews.comment: all the sudden the bt volume just become nearly impossible to hear.  pls fix this soon for more stars.  thx
reviews.author: Wan (Samuel) Leung

reviews.title: 30 seconds between drops?!
reviews.comment: If thirty seconds is the longest call your service provides, you guys really jumped the gun taking this to beta.   Glad it was free. 6 dropped calls and the recipient is annoyed. You frustrated both of us. Congrats.
reviews.author: shain kirby

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I have been using this app for like a year now I love it. Likes to cut out on 3g but that\'s the internet not the app itself. Works great on WiFi and on 4g. Love the new update finally can listen to my voice messages from the app. Great job.
reviews.author: dustin741

reviews.title: Cant recieve calls no matter what
reviews.comment: I thought I was set to use google voice as my primary number but this app misses too many notifications. I havent recieved a phone call since updating!
reviews.author: Ben Dotson

reviews.comment: 3-5second delay when speaking to others, choppy quality, calls constantly being dropped followed by an automatic reboot of application and since the update now my calls come in through my phone line within seconds of my Talkatone ringing or at the same time (sometimes while I am on my phone line) I pick up my. All with full Wi-Fi bars and no one using my Wi-Fi but myself. I can\'t anymore.
reviews.author: Mercy Nerestant

reviews.title: Great App!
reviews.comment: I moved from the States to Canada, and can\'t afford to call my friends.  With wifi at home, it\'s free to call them.  It\'s not perfect service, as it is going through wifi, then internet, then cell waves.. but hey, it\'s free, and it works!  The newest update has a nice design too.
reviews.author: Kaleb Phillips

reviews.title: Amazing app\' using as main business calling station.
reviews.comment: I am using Googe voice for business and this app allows me to do a lot of things, including having my new Nexus 7 be as a comm device. Reliable and cheap, and that\'s good for bottom line. Also about quality and stuff I am using free version and have no problems but I will spend if needed. Overall good experience.
reviews.author: Konstantin S

reviews.title: Problems with call
reviews.comment: I do like this app, but I am having trouble using it. Text seems to work just fine, but when I dial although the person answers (or the answering machine)  the phone continues to ring and will not stop unless I sign out of the app. Sounds like a glitch, other than that it looks great.
reviews.author: Steve B

reviews.title: :D
reviews.comment: It\'s Working Now... Good App
reviews.author: Tymetris Raino

reviews.title: The best.
reviews.comment: Paying just $30/mo for unlimited everything thanks to talkatone! Can\'t beat that!..
reviews.author: Jay Soriano

reviews.title: It works well.
reviews.comment: Only reason I give 2 star is because when I finish a phone convo and hang up to make another call, there is no audio or dial tone. Which makes me have to stop the app and restart it. Sometimes I can\'t make calls at all on my WiFi. 72mbp can\'t be my internet. Other than that. It is great.
reviews.author: Seymour Buttz

reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.comment: I highly recommend it.
reviews.author: Victoria D\'Cotledge

reviews.title: Galaxy S2 Epic 4g touch
reviews.comment: This app its amazing the onely little problem its you can berly hearing the other person. Keep up the good work and plz fix the volume
reviews.author: Gilberto Armendariz

reviews.title: So far... (htc one v)
reviews.comment: I really like this app, its so useful. The only problem I have (sometimes) is that as the phone is ringing and waiting to connect the call it suddenly hangs it up on its own never connecting my call. I call over and over and it would still hang up itself. Why? Please fix.
reviews.author: LaVonne Tucker

reviews.title: Hit or miss
reviews.comment: I have had sporadic issues in the past. Recently I\'ve noticed that the memory use has gone berserk. 450 megs! Unfortunately this renders it useless for me.  It will probably get fixed, and I\'ll be back!
reviews.author: Johnny Kauffman

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Good
reviews.author: Sandy Salib

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Galaxy Note 2: was a great app.even better with subscription.
reviews.author: Christopher Ross
